name: Car Mechanic Tycoon
summary: Step into the world of "Car Mechanic Tycoon," where you manage your very own mechanic workshop! Fix, upgrade, and customize cars while managing resources and expanding your business. From basic .tune-ups to complex overhauls, every job brings new challenges and rewards. Upgrade your tools, hire a skilled team, and become the ultimate car repair tycoon. With engaging mechanics and colorful graphics, "Car Mechanic Tycoon" is perfect for players who love strategy and simulation games!
